api

Interface Space<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - type of result to expect
    All Superinterfaces:
    Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpaceImp

    public interface Space<R>
extends Remote
    Defines a space that mediates between clients and connected Computers
    Author:
    Michael Nekrasov, Roman Kazarin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_NAME 
      static int DEFAULT_PORT

      • setJob

        void setJob(Task<R> task,
          SharedState initialState,
          Scheduler<R> customScheduler)
            throws RemoteException,
                   InterruptedException
        Sets the job of the space to specified task
        Parameters:
        task - to set, will point to solution
        initialState - to pass to system
        customScheduler - to run on Space
        Throws:
        RemoteException
        InterruptedException

      • getSolution

        Result<R> getSolution()
                      throws RemoteException,
                             InterruptedException
        Gets a solution from the solution queue. Blocks until solution is available.
        Returns:
        solution
        Throws:
        RemoteException
        InterruptedException

        REgister a new computer on this space
        Parameters:

      • updateState

        void updateState(int originatorID,
               SharedState state)
                 throws RemoteException
        Update the shared state on this space
        Parameters:
        originatorID - of the Computer that requests the update
        state - to update to (will compare the states)
        Throws:
        RemoteException
